roleset.name: to give warning to, frighten

example.name: "For" realization
example.text: I 'm sure that it must have been alarming for all concerned .

example.name: "To" complement, it EXP
example.text: I am an active, healthy woman, so it was alarming to me that I was going through these issues.
example.arg: that I was going trough these issues.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Member of Vncls amuse-31.1.
